Dimensional Anchor (Wards4 Abju): R300' Ranged touch bars extradimensional travel for 20 min
Elemental Body IV (Winds7 Tran): Self becomes huge air (+4 Strength, +6 Dexterity, +4 AC, fly 120', whirlwind), earth (+8 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +6 AC, earth glide), fire (+6 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +4 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+4 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +8 Constitution, +6 AC, swim 120', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision, immunity to bleeding, critical hits, and sneak attacks, DR 5/- for 20 min
Gaseous Form (Winds3 Tran): Touched becomes insubstantial (DR 10/magic, immune to poison, sneak attacks, and critical hits, unable to use spell components, fly 10') for 40 min
Glyph Of Warding (Wards3 Abju): Proscribed creatures who transit 100 sq' area trigger 5d8 HP blast in 5' radius (DC 15 Ref half) or harmful spell up to 3rd level
Guards And Wards (Wards6 Abju): Multiple magic effects protect 4000' sq area for 40 hr
Instant Summons (Wards7 Conj): Prepared object appears in self hand
Lesser Planar Binding (Wards5 Conj): Traps extraplanar creature(s) w/up to 6 HD (DC 17 Will neg) until they escape (SR, dimensional travel, or 27 Cha) or perform a task (Opposed Cha neg)
Secret Page (Wards2 Tran): Hides content of touched page permanently
Symbol Of Death (Wards8 Necr): R60' Rune slays (DC 20 Fort neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min or 150 HP killed
Teleportation Circle (Wards9 Conj): Transports creatures in 5' radius anywhere w/no error chance for 200 min
Whirlwind (Winds8 Evoc): R1200' Wind in 10' radius inflicts 3d6 HP, then 1d8 HP/rd for 20 rd (DC 20 Ref neg)
Whispering Wind (Winds1 Tran): R20 miles Self sends 25-word message or sound to 10' area
Wind Walk (Winds6 Tran): Self and 6 touched vaporize and move 60 MPH for 20 hr
Wind Wall (Winds2 Evoc): R300' 200'x5' curtain of air scatters objects, deflects arrows and bolts for 20 rd
Winds Of Vengeance (Winds9 Tran): Self gains 60' fly and immunity to wind, gas, and ranged weapons; inflicts on attackers 5d8 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (DC 21 Fort half HP only), for 20 min
